Package com.pubg.utils

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pubg.utils.FileUtils
  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain all basic files operations. This is a easy version of original File & Files class. This class generally contain methods which are used by class PubgUtils.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rahil khan

    • Method Detail

      • copyAsset

        public static boolean copyAsset​(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.String filename,
                                java.lang.String path)
        copy a file from assets folder to filesystem as provided by the path. The file can be in subdirectory.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to be copied
        path - The path where the asset is to be copied
        Returns:
        True if assets copied successfully, false otherwise

      • copy

        public static boolean copy​(java.lang.String filepath,
                           java.lang.String to)
        Copy file from one directory to another.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The file to be copied
        to - Path where to copy
        Returns:
        true if file is copied successfully, false otherwise

      • copyAllAssets

        public static boolean copyAllAssets​(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String path)
        copy all the files from assets folder to the path provided. If your assets include directories, then you must zip them & use copyAsset(Context, String, String) to copy that zip to filesystem.
        Parameters:
        path - The path where the assets is to be copied
        Returns:
        true if file is copied successfully, false otherwise

      • unZip

        public static boolean unZip​(java.lang.String filepath,
                            @Nullable
                            java.lang.String password)
        This will extract the zip to its parent directory with the same name.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The path of the zip file
        password - The password of zip if encrypted,null otherwise.
        Returns:
        true only if extraction succeed, false otherwise; may be because password is incorrect.

      • moveFile

        public static boolean moveFile​(java.lang.String filepath,
                               java.lang.String dest)
        Moves a file from one directory to another.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the file to be moved
        dest - Path where the file have to move
        Returns:
        true if file is moved successfully, false otherwise

      • rename

        public static boolean rename​(java.lang.String filepath,
                             java.lang.String renameTo)
        Rename the file.
        Parameters:
        filepath - File to be renamed
        renameTo - Name to rename the file
        Returns:
        true if file is renamed successfully, false otherwise

      • delete

        public static boolean delete​(@NonNull
                             java.lang.String path)
        Deletes the file or folder.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of file or folder to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if deletion is successful, false otherwise

                                boolean append)
        Writes string to the text file
        Parameters:

        data - The string which have to be written in file
